pages.text: A $(item)Block of Coal$() can be broken into $(item)Coal$() and $(item)Coal$() can be smashed into $(item)Coal Pieces$().
$(info) $(item)Coal Ore$() can be mined for $(item)Coal Pieces$().$(p)$(info) $(item)Coal$() can be mined from $(item)Coal Ore$() with $(thing)Iron Tools$().
$(item)Coal$() and $(item)Coal Pieces$() can be compacted into a $(item)Block of Coal$().
Soaking a $(item)Block of Charcoal$() in $(item)Coal Tar$() will create a $(item)Block of Coal$().
$(item)Dense Coal Ore$() can usually be found deep underground, most often within $(item)Coal Ore$() deposits.$(p)$(info) It can be harvested with $(thing)Iron Tools$().
